title: Project-Based Learning for Nursing Students Based on Community Practice Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and practical training experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening problem-solving skills through collaboration tools centered on smartphones in limited technological environments and analysis of community-based practical cases.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three aspects of nurses' autonomy and decision-making processes in community practice
Learners can propose patient-centered holistic care strategies by analyzing chronic disease management cases
Learners can understand educators' roles in practical settings and implement at least two effective learning engagement methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
